data.eml:eml: New species and a new subgenus of South American Neoathyreus Howden and Martínez (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae: Athyreini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Howden, Henry F. (2006): New species and a new subgenus of South American Neoathyreus Howden and Martínez (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae: Athyreini). Zootaxa 1137: 37-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273398
